analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0x78af82f8924f99cec0afef357105382b8a44708f.sol:
	Contract EraTokens has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x78af82f8924f99cec0afef357105382b8a44708f.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0x78af82f8924f99cec0afef357105382b8a44708f.sol#72-73) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of EraTokens.BurnToken (/unique_chucks/28/0x78af82f8924f99cec0afef357105382b8a44708f.sol#198-199) is not in mixedCase
